bridges.connect

Class DataFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bridges.connect.DataFormatter
  • Type Parameters:
    E - 

    public class DataFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection to the DataFormatters server. Initialize this class before using it, and call complete() afterward.
